BusinessLicense.name: BusinessLicense
BusinessLicense.description: Represents the licenses of a party role like healthcare provider or producer.

AccountId.description: ID of the organization holding the license.

ContactId.description: ID of the person who holds the license and is listed as a contact.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the license is active.

JurisdictionType.description: Jurisdiction for the license. Example values: State County Province Country

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LicenseClass.description: The class that the distributorâ€™s license belongs to. This field is available from API version 48.0 and later.

LineOfAuthority.description: The line of authority that the distributor is licensed for. This field is available from API version 48.0 and later.

Name.description: Name of the business or professional license.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ResidenceStatus.description: Residence status of the producer. This field is available from API version 48.0 and later.

Status.description: Current status of the license. Example values: Inactive Revoked Draft Verified

UserId.description: Person who holds the license and is listed as a user.

VerificationStatus.description: Current status for the license. Example values: Authorized Pending Unverified

VerifiedDate.description: License was validated on this date.
